templates.title: Autobrr
templates.description: Automatically download torrents from RSS feeds

templates.title: Immich
templates.description: Immich is a simple and lightweight image hosting service

templates.title: Kometa
templates.description: Kometa formerly known as Plex Meta Manager is a tool to manage your Plex library metadata.

templates.title: Nginx Proxy Manager
templates.description: Nginx Proxy Manager is a reverse proxy management system that is based on Nginx.

templates.title: Paperless NGX
templates.description: Paperless-ngx is a document management system that transforms your physical documents into a searchable online archive so you can keep, well, less paper.

templates.title: Pihole
templates.description: Pi-hole is a Linux network-level advertisement and Internet tracker blocking application which acts as a DNS sinkhole and optionally a DHCP server, intended for use on a private network.

templates.title: Plex
templates.description: Plex is a client-server media player system and software suite comprising two main components. The Plex Media Server desktop application runs on Windows, macOS, and Linux-compatibles including some types of NAS devices.

templates.title: qBittorrent
templates.description: qBittorrent is a free and open-source BitTorrent client that aims to be a good alternative to ÂµTorrent.

templates.title: Servarr
templates.description: Servarr is a collection of services for managing your media collection.
templates.note: Deploys Radarr, Sonarr, Prowlarr, Bazarr, Maintainerr, Recyclarr and FlareSolverr.

templates.title: TeslaMate
templates.description: TeslaMate is a self-hosted data logger for your Tesla vehicle.

templates.title: TOR Relay
templates.description: TOR is a free software for enabling anonymous communication. The name is derived from an acronym for the original software project name "The Onion Router".
templates.note: Deploys a Tor Relay with OBFS4 protocol.

templates.title: Tdarr Server Node (GPU Transcoding)
templates.description: Tdarr is a popular conditional transcoding application for processing large (or small) media libraries. The application comes in the form of a click-to-run web-app, which you run on your own device and access through a web browser.
templates.note: Deploys a Tdarr server with GPU transcoding support.

templates.title: Tdarr Server Node (CPU Transcoding)
templates.description: Tdarr is a popular conditional transcoding application for processing large (or small) media libraries. The application comes in the form of a click-to-run web-app, which you run on your own device and access through a web browser.
templates.note: Deploys a Tdarr server with CPU transcoding support.

templates.title: Tdarr Worker Node (GPU Transcoding)
templates.description: Tdarr is a popular conditional transcoding application for processing large (or small) media libraries. The application comes in the form of a click-to-run web-app, which you run on your own device and access through a web browser.
templates.note: Deploys a Tdarr worker node with GPU transcoding support.

templates.title: Tdarr Worker Node (CPU Transcoding)
templates.description: Tdarr is a popular conditional transcoding application for processing large (or small) media libraries. The application comes in the form of a click-to-run web-app, which you run on your own device and access through a web browser.
templates.note: Deploys a Tdarr worker node with CPU transcoding support.
